excerpt_i18n.zh: 雷峰网讯 ﻿9 月 22 日，百度搜索教育新品交流会在北京中关村学说空间举办。会上正式推出 AI 伴学产品，其中包括 AI 精准练、AI 口语等重磅功能。产品入口目前集成于百度 App 内，据官方介绍，此举意在“让普通手机一键变身免费学习机，助力教育平权”。 AI 教育产品百花齐放，产品形态选择独立软件还是专门硬件，各个厂商招数不一。对于百度来说， 把教育产品集成在百度 App 内部，或许正是目前的全局最优解。 虽然是陪伴孩子，但 AI 伴学产品最初的用户往往是家长。从年龄来看，这部分人群和百度 App 的用户画像有所重合，用户迁移成本几乎为零。在此基础上，集成模块的产品形态又省去了实体学习机必然带来的硬件成本，真正实现了让家长无痛使用的产品体验。 产品功能方面，这款「学习机」除了拥有国内主流教材视频讲解、各地区小初高模拟题真题等海量优质学习资源，搭载独家的 AI 精准练、AI 口语、AI 作文批改等一系列精心打磨过的 AI 教育产品，还可以设置家长模式，实时掌控孩子的学习情况。 在 AI 伴学模式下，百度 App 首页原有的信息流会被“拍照搜题”、“在线答疑”等功能取代，且家长可通过设置密码等方式进行锁定，避免了孩子使用手机的过程中分心。 其中，AI 精准练是集「作业批改、学情分析、巩固练习 」三大能力于一体的个性化学习工具，旨在帮助孩子实现「知对错-找薄弱-促提升」的高效学习循环，支持小初高全学段、全学科题目检索，而且向家长学生全部免费开放使用。 值得一提的是，百度此前发布的数字人技术也在直播电商之外找到了新的用武之地，即此次同步推出的 AI 口语功能。 据介绍，为了打磨这些 AI 功能，百度教育团队专门研发了一套更聪明、更高效的模型，依托文心 4.5、DeepSeek 等底座大模型、百度文本检索引擎及自建知识图谱，实现了全流程智能化、个性化、精准化。 雷峰网文章
excerpt_i18n.en:
On September 22, Leifeng News reported that Baidu Search held an education product launch event at the Zhongguancun Learning Space in Beijing. The event officially introduced an AI learning companion product, featuring key functions such as AI precision exercises and AI speaking practice. The product is currently integrated within the Baidu App, with the official aim to "turn an ordinary smartphone into a free learning device with one click, promoting educational equity." 

As AI education products flourish, companies vary in their approaches—some opt for standalone software, others for dedicated hardware. For Baidu, integrating the education product into its app may be the optimal solution. Although designed to accompany children, the initial users of the AI learning companion are often parents. This demographic overlaps with Baidu App's user profile, minimizing migration costs. Additionally, the integrated module eliminates hardware expenses associated with physical learning devices, offering a seamless experience for parents.

Functionally, this "learning device" includes video explanations aligned with national textbooks, a vast library of practice tests for primary to high school levels across regions, and exclusive AI features like precision exercises, speaking practice, and essay grading. It also offers a parent mode for real-time monitoring of children's progress. In AI companion mode, the Baidu App homepage replaces its standard information feed with features like "photo-based problem search" and "online Q&A," allowing parents to oversee learning activities.
excerpt_i18n.es: El 22 de septiembre, Leifeng Net informó que la conferencia de intercambio sobre nuevos productos educativos de Baidu Search se celebró en el espacio académico de Zhongguancun, Beijing. En el evento se lanzó oficialmente el producto de acompañamiento educativo con IA, que incluye funciones destacadas como ejercicios precisos con IA y práctica oral con IA. La entrada al producto está actualmente integrada en la aplicación de Baidu. Según la presentación oficial, el objetivo es "transformar un teléfono común en una herramienta de aprendizaje gratuita con un solo clic, promoviendo la equidad educativa". Los productos educativos con IA están floreciendo, y cada fabricante elige diferentes enfoques, ya sea como software independiente o hardware especializado. Para Baidu, integrar el producto educativo dentro de su aplicación parece ser la solución óptima actual. Aunque está diseñado para acompañar a los niños, la IA

title_i18n.zh: 全球AI云战场开打： 微软云、AWS 向左，谷歌、阿里云向右
title_i18n.en: The global AI cloud battle begins: Microsoft Cloud and AWS go left, while Google and Alibaba Cloud go right.
title_i18n.es: El campo de batalla global de la nube de IA comienza: Microsoft Cloud y AWS hacia la izquierda, Google y Alibaba Cloud hacia la derecha.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 最近，几乎每位出差的人都会有同感：“北上广的机场核心位置，几乎被各大 AI 云厂商占满了！” 在云计算的赛道上，AI 云已经成为新一轮的入场券。它不仅关乎算力，更决定厂商能否摆脱价格战泥潭、重建护城河，以及在全球科技牌桌上争得一席之地。因此，过去两年里，国内云厂商在战略、组织等各个环节都全力投入，争夺市场领先地位的竞争愈发激烈，“第一”的争夺成为行业关注的核心。 对于大厂来说，“AI 云第一”不仅是数字排名，更是一种行业认可和市场号召力。谁能贴上这个标签，谁就更容易吸引客户、赢得市场份额。 但如果把眼光放宽点，在全球范围内，AI云的竞争格局更激烈，如今只剩4朵超级AI云：美国的AWS、微软和谷歌，以及中国的阿里云。 AI云不等于模型调用 谁是 AI 云 “第一”？取决于评判标准。不同群体基于不同视角，答案也各不相同。 有部分人认为，模型是评判AI云第一的核心要素。 理由也很简单，企业最终是要用模型来解决问题的，客户会用脚投票。尤其是在当下，很多公司都陷入了“AI焦虑”，迫切希望模型能真正帮上忙。谁的模型能不断迭代升级，在不同场景里都能答得准、算得快、还能带来新思路，谁就更容易在AI云的竞争中脱颖而出。 火山引擎所强调的“调用量”，其实也是这一逻辑的延伸——通过高频调用，来侧面证明其模型的成熟度与市场接受度。 但雷峰网认为，如果从市场规模上看，以模型调用为主的MaaS市场，远比不上千亿级别的云计算市场。更重要的是，如果从长远来看，随着AI应用进入更深层次的产业化阶段，要构建一朵真正的超级AI云，仅靠模型表现远远不够。 这就像一座大厦，地基坚实、结构完整，才能在风雨中稳固屹立，并为未来扩建和升级提供可靠支撑。因此，未来要真正评估谁才是AI 云第一，必须经历这四大硬核拷问： 第一，每年是否有千亿级的基础设施投入？ AI云真正的门槛不是宣传口号，而是实打实的资金实力。今年头部云厂商
excerpt_i18n.en: Recently, almost every business traveler would agree: "The prime advertising spaces in Beijing, Shanghai, and Guangzhou airports are almost entirely occupied by major AI cloud providers!" In the race of cloud computing, AI cloud has become the new entry ticket. It not only concerns computing power but also determines whether providers can escape the price war, rebuild their competitive moats, and secure a place at the global tech table. As a result, over the past two years, domestic cloud providers have invested heavily in strategy, organization, and every other aspect, intensifying the competition for market leadership, with the battle for "first place" becoming the industry's focal point. For major players, being "number one in AI cloud" is not just a numerical ranking but also industry recognition and market influence. Whoever claims this title finds it easier to attract clients and gain market share. However, broadening the perspective globally, the competition in AI cloud is even fiercer, now narrowed down to four super AI clouds: AWS, Microsoft, and Google from the U.S., along with China's Alibaba Cloud. AI cloud is not just about model access. Who is "first" in AI cloud? It depends on the criteria. Different groups, from different viewpoints, have varying answers. Some believe the model is the core factor in judging AI cloud leadership. The reasoning is straightforward: businesses ultimately use models to solve problems, and clients vote with their feet. Especially now, many companies are experiencing "AI anxiety," urgently hoping models can genuinely assist. Whose models can continuously iterate, deliver accurate and fast results across various scenarios, and offer innovative approaches will more likely lead in AI cloud.
excerpt_i18n.es: Últimamente, casi cualquier persona que viaje por trabajo comparte la misma impresión: "¡Las ubicaciones centrales de los aeropuertos de Beijing, Shanghái y Cantón están prácticamente copadas por los principales proveedores de nube de IA!" En la carrera de la computación en la nube, la nube de IA se ha convertido en la nueva credencial de acceso. No solo se trata de capacidad de cálculo, sino que también determina si los proveedores pueden escapar del pantano de la guerra de precios, reconstruir su ventaja competitiva y ganar un lugar en la mesa global de tecnología. Por ello, en los últimos dos años, los proveedores nacionales de nube han invertido a fondo en todos los aspectos, desde la estrategia hasta la organización, y la competencia por el liderazgo del mercado se ha intensificado cada vez más, convirtiéndose la lucha por el "primer puesto" en el centro de atención de la industria. Para los grandes actores, ser "el número uno en nube de IA" no es solo una clasificación numérica, sino también un reconocimiento del sector y un poder de convocatoria en el mercado.

title_i18n.zh: 硅基流动入局企业级 MaaS，重写大模型落地叙事
title_i18n.en: Silicon-based Flow enters the enterprise MaaS sector, rewriting the narrative for large model implementation.
title_i18n.es: Silicon-based Flow entra en el MaaS empresarial, reescribiendo la narrativa de implementación de modelos grandes.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 2025 年，AI 大模型已从“概念验证”走到“价值兑现”的关键阶段。 越来越多企业开始思考：大模型不仅要能用，还要真正带来业务效率的提升与成本的可控。在这一背景下，硅基流动推出了企业级 MaaS平台。 作为覆盖算力纳管、模型训练、推理部署到场景应用的全链路解决方案，回应了大模型产业化落地的五大核心矛盾：适配速度、性能与成本、可靠性、质量、以及安全合规。不仅帮企业解决了落地过程中的关键挑战，更为产业提供了一套能够规模化复制的智能基础设施。   破解大模型落地的五大挑战 大模型的产业化进程中，企业普遍面临模型适配、推理性能与成本、服务可靠性、输出质量和安全合规等五大挑战。硅基流动的企业级 MaaS 平台，正是针对这些痛点，提供了系统性的解法： 快速引入，一键部署：预集成 100+ 主流开源与闭源大模型，结合多种算力卡推理加速包，实现开箱即用。依托硅基流动公有云能力，新模型最快可在 1–3 天内完成适配并同步至企业私有环境，大幅缩短上线周期。 高性能与低成本兼顾：通过智能路由、自研推理框架和动态扩缩容，实现性能与成本的最优平衡。上下文感知、KV Cache 感知、LoRA 感知等策略，加上算子优化、显存管理与量化加速，大幅提升吞吐并降低延迟。 高可靠与可观测：支持多集群容灾与无缝故障切换，保障服务持续稳定；多维度监控能力则覆盖模型性能、资源使用和业务指标，实现精细化治理。 测评驱动的质量优化：内置测评工具链，支持自定义测评集与结果比对，帮助企业完成模型选型与 Prompt 优化，同时支持一键调优和 Multi-LoRA 推理，进一步节省资源。 企业级安全与合规：通过多租户数据隔离、细粒度权限管控和全链路日志审计，为企业提供全方位的安全与合规保障。 这套能力组合，让企业能够高效、稳定、安全地拥抱大模型技术，并实现规模化落地。 从“试点成功”到“规模化应用” 过
excerpt_i18n.en:
By 2025, AI large models have entered a critical phase of transitioning from "proof of concept" to "value realization." More and more enterprises are beginning to consider that large models must not only be usable but also genuinely enhance business efficiency and ensure controllable costs. Against this backdrop, Silicon-based Flow has launched an enterprise-grade MaaS platform. As an end-to-end solution covering computing resource management, model training, inference deployment, and scenario application, it addresses the five core challenges in the industrialization of large models: adaptation speed, performance versus cost, reliability, quality, and security and compliance. It not only helps enterprises overcome key hurdles in implementation but also provides the industry with a scalable and replicable intelligent infrastructure. 

Addressing the Five Major Challenges of Large Model Deployment
In the industrialization of large models, enterprises commonly face five challenges: model adaptation, inference performance and cost, service reliability, output quality, and security and compliance. Silicon-based Flow's enterprise MaaS platform offers systematic solutions to these pain points:
- Rapid integration and one-click deployment: Pre-integrated with 100+ mainstream open-source and proprietary large models, combined with various computing card inference acceleration packages, enabling out-of-the-box use. Leveraging Silicon-based Flow's public cloud capabilities, new models can be adapted and synchronized to private enterprise environments in as little as 1–3 days, significantly shortening deployment cycles.
- Balancing high performance and low cost: Achieves optimal balance between performance and cost through intelligent routing, self-developed inference frameworks, and dynamic scaling. Context-aware, KV Cache-aware, LoRA...
excerpt_i18n.es: En 2025, los grandes modelos de IA han entrado en una fase crucial de pasar de la "prueba de concepto" a la "materialización de valor". Cada vez más empresas empiezan a considerar que estos modelos no solo deben ser utilizables, sino que también deben mejorar realmente la eficiencia operativa y controlar los costes. En este contexto, Silicone Flow ha lanzado una plataforma MaaS empresarial. A total of 17 teams and 46 developers completed 17 new "AI + Public Welfare" projects through 48 hours of intensive development. title_i18n.zh: 高德 AI 别再打古典互联网战争了
title_i18n.en: Gaode AI, stop fighting the classical internet wars.
title_i18n.es: Alto Mapa IA, deja de librar las guerras clásicas de internet.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 高德切入leifen市场的小道消息传得沸沸扬扬，昨天这个新产品揭开帷幕，原来并非是口碑重启，而是高德扫街榜发布。 谜底揭开，但是疑问并没有结束，过去三个月的外卖补贴大战如火如荼，高德再再再打到店，是不是还要再来一次补贴大战？十年前，美团横扫所有团购平台，现在阿里要“君子报仇”，卷土重来？ 在 AI 科技评论看来，团购已经是美团和抖音的修罗场，高德再下场也就是卷补贴、打价格战，不可能形成新的叙事，反而会让人担心是否会重复之前的结果，担心是否会影响阿里的盈利能力。 在智能时代，用更高的维度，打一场全新的技术战争，凸显高德优势，才是最佳选择。 高德的优势，在于 POI，在于数据，在于路线规划，而不在于内容和社交。如果这些数据能够成为帮助高德成为人们生活规划的大管家，那么本地生活也就手到擒来。 地图的未来，就是升级成「生活操作系统」 地图的本质，就是在数字世界里建模现实空间，AI时代带来之后，地图就可以不仅仅是一个平面、瞬时的二维空间，而是可以成为了一个，能够加入规划和决策、历时性、立体性的三维空间。 这会带来什么结果呢？以前的地图是告诉你「从 A 到 B 怎么走」，这是解决点到点的问题；以后的地图，告诉你「某段时间内要做什么」，这解决的是「人在一个场景里如何行动」的问题。 比如你在北京西单，AI 不是只给你一个火锅店地址，而是帮你规划：停车 → 吃饭 → 看电影 → 买单返券。它能理解这个空间下的一整套需求链。换句话说，从「导航」到「编排生活」，这就是空间智能。 高德在这方面其实有天然优势。它有全国最全的路网数据、POI 数据、实时路况，背后是十几年积累下来的街景采集、路径规划算法。别人要做空间智能，第一步还得先买数据，但高德直接站在金矿上。理论上，它最有机会把地图升级成「生活操作系统」。但问题是，高德现在走的方向还是偏「智能体」，就是在地图里放一个 AI 助手，帮你算路、推荐餐
excerpt_i18n.en:

The mystery is solved, but questions remain. Over the past three months, the food delivery subsidy war has been intense. With Amap re-entering the in-store services sector, will another subsidy battle ensue? A decade ago, Meituan dominated all group-buying platforms. Now, is Alibaba seeking revenge and making a comeback?

If Amap joins the fray, it will only mean more subsidies and price wars, unlikely to create a new narrative. Amap's advantages lie in POI, data, and route planning, not in content and social features. If this data can help Amap become a life planning assistant for users, conquering local services will be effortless. The future of maps is evolving into a "life operating system."

With the advent of the AI era, maps can transcend flat, instantaneous 2D spaces to become 3D spaces that incorporate planning, decision-making, and a temporal dimension. What will this lead to? title_i18n.zh: 谁在重新定义 AI 云？
title_i18n.en: Who is redefining AI cloud?
title_i18n.es: ¿Quién está redefiniendo la nube de IA?

excerpt_i18n.zh: 过去几年，AI 几乎成了云计算行业的统一叙事。 无论是阿里提出的全面 AI 化，火山云强调的 Token性价比，还是百度持续加码的大模型战略，厂商们都在努力用 AI 定义未来的云。但当这些口号越来越密集时，也变得越来越相似。 算力提升、模型迭代、Agent 探索，几乎成了每一家厂商的必备动作，差异化正在快速消解。宣传中，各种“全球领先”“业内首创”的表述层出不穷，但落到用户体验与产业落地，差别并不显著。对大多数企业来说，除了价格、服务条款和生态黏性，真正能感知到的差异其实并不多。 另一方面，AI 本身也正从“炫技”走向“应用”。2023年 到 2024 年间，行业一度沉浸在大模型突破带来的震撼中，但进入 2025年，客户的关注点已不再是模型参数的数量或推理速度的极限，而是如何把 AI 嵌入产业流程，真正带来效率和价值。换句话说，现在的问题已经不在于 AI 能否更强，而在于它能否更有用。 在这样的背景下，华为云在华为全联接大会 2025 上提出了一套新的组合：超节点 Token 服务、液冷、企业级 Agent，并将具身智能、盘古大模型纳入其中，颇有一种想要突破行业现状的感觉。表面上是新技术的推出，实质上是对行业现实的回应——当成本、基建和应用都成为瓶颈时，差异化的叙事已成为厂商的必答题。 AI 云的困境 今天的 AI 云，几乎都在讲同样的故事：大算力、大模型、大生态。 算力规模、训练速度、推理延迟被摆在最显眼的位置，厂商之间不断刷新极限，以此证明自己的领先地位。大家的焦点都落在技术性能的极限上，却鲜少能回答一个更现实的问题：这些技术突破如何
excerpt_i18n.en:
In recent years, AI has almost become the unifying narrative of the cloud computing industry. Whether it's Alibaba's push for comprehensive AI integration, Volcano Cloud's emphasis on token cost-effectiveness, or Baidu's continued investment in large model strategies, vendors are striving to define the future of the cloud with AI. However, as these slogans grow more frequent, they also become increasingly similar. Improvements in computing power, model iterations, and Agent exploration have become standard moves for nearly every vendor, with differentiation rapidly diminishing. In promotional materials, claims of "global leadership" and "industry firsts" abound, but in terms of user experience and industrial implementation, the differences are not significant. For most enterprises, beyond pricing, service terms, and ecosystem stickiness, there are few truly perceptible distinctions.

On the other hand, AI itself is shifting from "showcasing technical prowess" to "practical application." Between 2023 and 2024, the industry was once immersed in the awe of breakthroughs in large models, but by 2025, customer focus has moved away from model parameter counts or inference speed limits to how AI can be embedded into industrial processes to genuinely enhance efficiency and value. In other words, the question is no longer whether AI can become more powerful, but whether it can become more useful.

Against this backdrop, Huawei Cloud at Huawei Connect
excerpt_i18n.es: En los últimos años, la IA se ha convertido casi en la narrativa unificada de la industria de la computación en la nube. Ya sea la transformación integral impulsada por IA propuesta por Alibaba, la relación calidad-precio de Token enfatizada por Volcano Cloud, o la estrategia de modelos grandes en la que Baidu sigue invirtiendo, los proveedores se esfuerzan por definir la nube del futuro con IA. Pero cuando estos eslóganes se vuelven cada vez más frecuentes, también se tornan más similares. La mejora de la capacidad de computación, la iteración de modelos y la exploración de Agent se han convertido en acciones casi obligatorias para cada proveedor, y la diferenciación se disuelve rápidamente. En la publicidad, proliferan expresiones como "líder mundial" e "innovación pionera en la industria", pero su implementación...

title_i18n.zh: 淘宝悄悄做起AI搜索
title_i18n.en: Taobao quietly launched an AI search feature.
title_i18n.es: Taobao comienza discretamente a implementar búsquedas con IA.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 最近顾枫陷入了深深的苦恼：他准备参加一个朋友的小孩生日宴，由于平时极少接触儿童，他始终想不出应该买什么样的礼物，既显得不失礼数，又符合小朋友的喜好。 淘宝近期推出的AI工具——AI万能搜，正好帮他解决了燃眉之急。 “AI万能搜”是今年8月中旬，淘宝上线的一款基于大模型的AI问答产品，支持深度思考，用户可以用自然语言提问，AI会生成一份融合了文字、商品、视频图片的“答案”，引导用户选择商品及下单。 这并不是淘宝在电商搜索领域唯一的AI新产品。雷峰网了解到，淘宝还正在灰测“AI助手”，其类似于导购员的角色，能引导用户理清自己的真实需求，并精准给出筛选结果。 虽说两款产品都处于低调测试阶段，官方没有对外宣传，但仍有被外界关注到并引发了不少讨论。有人认为AI不够可信、思考反应偏慢，也有人对“AI导购”的构想极为赞叹。 那么，对比其他AI大模型应用，淘宝这两款AI搜索产品真的能成为用户的智慧大脑，做好导购员角色吗？它究竟好不好用？雷峰网来测试一番。 AI 万能搜和 AI 助手，到底有什么不一样 AI助手和AI万能搜的本质，都是通过AI来提升用户在淘宝的搜索体验，功能上二者各有千秋，却也都能满足用户不同的痛点。 它们的区别在于，一个可以解决用户想买一个东西但说不清具体要什么样的、需要一个导购来帮助细化需求的问题；而另一个则更像一个私人助理，可以解决用户不知道要买什么的问题。 淘宝AI助手切中的场景就是前者，当用户不知道如何描述需求时，可以直接点击AI生成的标签，AI能够智能回答，快速解决用户商品筛选、对比等购物决策问题。 不过这款产品目前还在灰度测试中，打开淘宝在搜索框输入手机（也可以输入其他品类），会看到右下角的AI图标（如下图左），一键点击就能唤醒。当然，AI助手在商品的信息流里还内置了一个卡片式的入口（如下图右）。 从体感来说，这两个入口的设置非常用心，照顾到了不同人群的购物特点
excerpt_i18n.en:
Recently, Gu Feng found himself deeply troubled: he was preparing to attend a friend's child's birthday party but, having little exposure to children, couldn't decide on an appropriate gift that would be both polite and appealing to the child. Taobao's recently launched AI tool—AI Wanneng Sou (AI Universal Search)—came to his rescue just in time.  

AI Wanneng Sou is an AI Q&A product based on a large model, launched by Taobao in mid-August this year. It supports deep thinking, allowing users to ask questions in natural language. The AI then generates an "answer" that combines text, products, videos, and images to guide users in selecting items and placing orders.  

This isn't Taobao's only new AI product in the e-commerce search domain. Leiphone learned that Taobao is also testing an "AI Assistant," which acts like a shopping guide, helping users clarify their real needs and providing precise filtering results.  

Although both products are in low-key testing phases with no official promotion, they have attracted external attention and sparked considerable discussion. Some question the AI's reliability and slower response times, while others are highly impressed with the concept of an "AI shopping guide."  

So, compared to other large AI model applications, can Taobao's two AI search products truly serve as users' intelligent brains and excel as shopping guides? How effective are they? Leiphone put them to the test.  

What exactly is the difference between AI Wanneng Sou and AI Assistant?  

At their core, both AI Assistant and AI Wanneng Sou aim to enhance users' search experience on Taobao through AI. While each has its unique strengths, both are designed to meet user needs.
excerpt_i18n.es: Recientemente, Gu Feng se encontraba sumido en una profunda preocupación: planeaba asistir a la fiesta de cumpleaños del hijo de un amigo, pero como rara vez tenía contacto con niños, no lograba decidir qué regalo comprar que fuera tanto apropiado como del agrado del pequeño. La herramienta de IA lanzada recientemente por Taobao, la Búsqueda Universal de IA, resolvió precisamente su urgencia. La Búsqueda Universal de IA es un producto de preguntas y respuestas basado en modelos de gran escala, lanzado por Taobao a mediados de agosto de este año, que admite razonamiento profundo. Los usuarios pueden hacer preguntas en lenguaje natural, y la IA genera una "respuesta" que combina texto, productos, videos e imágenes, guiando a los usuarios en la selección y compra de artículos. Esta no es la única innovación de Taobao en el campo de la búsqueda comercial con IA.

title_i18n.zh: 腾讯云副总裁曹磊：“云 + AI”帮助消费电子蓄能出海，蓄势创新
title_i18n.en: Tencent Cloud Vice President Cao Lei: "Cloud + AI" assists consumer electronics in building momentum for overseas expansion and innovation.
title_i18n.es: El vicepresidente de Tencent Cloud, Cao Lei: "Nube + IA" ayuda a la electrónica de consumo a acumular energía para expandirse globalmente y prepararse para la innovación.

excerpt_i18n.zh: “云+AI不仅能打破行业内卷的局限，帮助企业走出去，更能助力行业开辟新模式、挖掘新增长”9月17日，在2025腾讯全球数字生态大会消费电子专场，腾讯云副总裁、智能制造与智慧能源负责人曹磊表示。曹磊介绍，因为云技术与 AI 在消费电子行业的广泛应用和落地，今年，颠覆式的商业模式创新、更好支撑出海的常态、AI 场景应用的普及、及围绕体验融合的创新成为行业发展的几个显著趋势。   腾讯云副总裁、智能制造与智慧能源负责人曹磊     大模型深入业务全场景，驱动企业高效率增长 过去一年，消费电子行业价格竞争激烈，不少企业面临发展压力。而AI技术的应用，可推动行业从“拼低价”向“拼创新”转型。荣耀云平台首席架构师欧阳国柱表示，依托腾讯云在多模态数据处理、端到端自动化管理、多云灵活适配等领域的技术优势，荣耀顺利推动自身从“全云化”向“智能化”转型，双方联合开发的AI辅助编码工具，有效提升了研发人员的开发效率与代码质量，为产品创新提速奠定基础。   荣耀云平台首席架构师欧阳国柱   随着大模型的产业应用加速，企业不仅能够实现降本提效，还能挖掘新的增长空间。酷开智能系统研究院院长郭尚锋介绍道，酷开智能与腾讯云展开深度合作，构建了“影视、教育、健康、创作、生活、设备”的超级智能体架构，可提供精准影视推荐、教育学习、健康管理、语音查询电费等多元化服务，推动消费电子企业从“单一设备销售”的传统业务模式，向“服务与体验输出”的全新模式升级，进而实现增长。   酷开智能系统研究院院长郭尚锋 美的集团与腾讯云在全屋智能领域的合作，也是大模型应用的典型实践。美的集团中国区域、全屋智能研发总监谭荣港介绍道，从2022年为COLMO高端空调提供音乐内容和AI语音助手能力，到2024年为灵眸蒸烤箱植入AIoT能力，再到2025年将合作拓展
excerpt_i18n.en:
Cloud + AI can not only break through the limitations of industry involution and help companies expand globally, but also assist industries in exploring new models and uncovering new growth opportunities, said Cao Lei, Vice President of Tencent Cloud and Head of Intelligent Manufacturing and Smart Energy, at the Consumer Electronics Session of the 2025 Tencent Global Digital Ecosystem Summit on September 17. Cao Lei explained that due to the widespread application and implementation of cloud technology and AI in the consumer electronics industry, several significant trends have emerged this year: disruptive business model innovation, better support for the normalization of overseas expansion, the proliferation of AI application scenarios, and innovation centered on experience integration.  

Large models are penetrating all business scenarios, driving high-efficiency growth for enterprises. Over the past year, the consumer electronics industry has faced intense price competition, with many companies under development pressure. The application of AI technology can drive the industry's transition from competing on low prices to competing on innovation. Ouyang Guozhu, Chief Architect of Honor Cloud Platform, stated that leveraging Tencent Cloud's technical advantages in multimodal data processing, end-to-end automated management, and flexible multi-cloud adaptation, Honor has successfully advanced its transformation from full cloudification to intelligence. The jointly developed AI-assisted coding tool has effectively improved developers' efficiency and code quality, laying the foundation for accelerated product innovation.  

As the industrial application of large models accelerates, enterprises can not only achieve cost reduction and efficiency improvement but also...
excerpt_i18n.es: La nube y la IA no solo pueden romper las limitaciones del círculo vicioso interno de la industria y ayudar a las empresas a expandirse globalmente, sino que también pueden impulsar a la industria a abrir nuevos modelos y explorar nuevos crecimientos, declaró Cao Lei, vicepresidente de Tencent Cloud y responsable de fabricación inteligente y energía inteligente, el 17 de septiembre en la sesión especializada en electrónica de consumo de la Cumbre Global de Ecosistema Digital de Tencent 2025. Cao Lei explicó que, debido a la amplia aplicación e implementación de la tecnología en la nube y la IA en la industria de electrónica de consumo, este año se han observado varias tendencias significativas en el desarrollo del sector: innovación disruptiva en modelos de negocio, mejor apoyo para la expansión global como norma, popularización de aplicaciones de escenarios de IA e innovación centrada en la integración de experiencias.

title_i18n.zh: Data＋AI驱动技术服务升级，腾讯云智能顾问和腾讯云可观测发布全新AI能力，助力客户高效用云
title_i18n.en: Data and AI-driven technology services upgrade, Tencent Cloud Intelligent Advisor and Tencent Cloud Observability launch new AI capabilities to help customers use cloud services efficiently.
title_i18n.es: Los servicios impulsados por datos e IA mejoran la tecnología. El Asesor de Inteligencia de Tencent Cloud y la Plataforma de Observabilidad de Tencent Cloud lanzan nuevas capacidades de IA para ayudar a los clientes a utilizar la nube de manera eficiente.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 9月17日，腾讯云宣布技术服务两大升级，发布智能顾问“卓越架构＋Multi-Agent”和可观测的AI平台，以Data＋AI驱动专业服务，助力客户高效用云。 腾讯云技术服务副总裁徐勇州 腾讯云技术服务副总裁徐勇州在2025腾讯全球数字生态大会卓越架构与可观测专场论坛上表示，Data+AI的大趋势下，做技术服务的理念需要一些转变，把原来建工具、建流程的思维方式转变成把服务看成产品，过去几年腾讯云在服务上探索的最宝贵经验，就是把过程和架构治理数据积累起来，通过AI不断提升技术服务质量。  2025年，腾讯云智能顾问实现了 “卓越架构 + Multi-Agent”的全面升级，带来了卓越架构标准、标准的产品化实践并发布全新的智能顾问Multi-Agent，这是全球首款卓越架构AI治理平台，通过可视化、AI Agent化，助力企业云上卓越架构治理更高效。   腾讯云智能顾问Muti-agent 架构图   腾讯云智能顾问此次升级，实现了“产品级Agent”到“客户场景级Multi-Agent” 的飞跃，不再是孤立地检查云服务器或数据库，而是能够理解“新游戏上线”、“大促护航”、“资源规划”等具体业务场景，调动多个智能体协同工作，提供跨产品的、端到端的综合治理方案。 腾讯云智能顾问产品总经理许小川   腾讯云智能顾问产品总经理许小川介绍，今年7月腾讯云联合中国信通院发布了 《云服务卓越架构能力成熟度模型》，卓越架构从稳定性、安全、性能、成本、运营运维五大支柱出发，将企业的云上架构能力分为5个等级：从初始级、基础级、全面级，到优秀级，最终到最高级别的卓越级——其核心特征就是智能化与可视化。 《云服务卓越架构能力成熟度模型》   腾讯云智能顾问率先将标准进行产品化落地。腾讯云智能顾问平台基于“3层×6支柱”评估体系，量化卓越架构指数，并通过
excerpt_i18n.en: On September 17, Tencent Cloud announced two major upgrades to its technical services, launching the intelligent advisor "Excellent Architecture + Multi-Agent" and an observable AI platform, driving professional services with Data + AI to help customers use cloud services more efficiently. Xu Yongzhou, Vice President of Technical Services at Tencent Cloud, stated at the 2025 Tencent Global Digital Ecosystem Conference's Excellent Architecture and Observability Forum that under the major trend of Data + AI, the concept of technical services requires some transformation—shifting from building tools and processes to viewing services as products. Over the past few years, Tencent Cloud's most valuable experience in service exploration has been accumulating process and architecture governance data and continuously improving technical service quality through AI. In 2025, Tencent Cloud's intelligent advisor achieved a comprehensive upgrade to "Excellent Architecture + Multi-Agent," introducing excellent architecture standards, standardized productized practices, and launching the new intelligent advisor Multi-Agent, the world's first excellent architecture AI governance platform. Through visualization and AI Agent capabilities, it helps enterprises achieve more efficient governance of excellent cloud architectures. This upgrade represents a leap from "product-level Agent" to "customer scenario-level Multi-Agent," no longer just checking cloud servers or databases in isolation but understanding scenarios such as "new game launches."
excerpt_i18n.es: El 17 de septiembre, Tencent Cloud anunció dos grandes mejoras en servicios técnicos: el lanzamiento del asesor inteligente "Arquitectura Superior + Multi-Agent" y una plataforma de IA observable, impulsando servicios profesionales con Data + IA para ayudar a los clientes a utilizar la nube de manera eficiente. Xu Yongzhou, vicepresidente de servicios técnicos de Tencent Cloud, declaró en el foro especializado sobre arquitectura superior y observabilidad de la Conferencia Global de Ecosistema Digital de Tencent 2025 que, bajo la gran tendencia de Data + IA, la filosofía de los servicios técnicos necesita cierta transformación, cambiando la mentalidad de construir herramientas y procesos para ver el servicio como un producto. La experiencia más valiosa explorada por Tencent Cloud en servicios durante los últimos años ha sido gobernar procesos y arquitecturas.

title_i18n.zh: 腾讯云黄世飞：全面升级Data+AI能力，构建企业智能化数据基座
title_i18n.en: Tencent Cloud's Huang Shifei: Comprehensive Upgrade of Data+AI Capabilities to Build an Intelligent Data Foundation for Enterprises.
title_i18n.es: Huang Shifei de Tencent Cloud: Actualización integral de las capacidades de datos e IA para construir una base de datos inteligente empresarial.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 9月17日，在腾讯全球数字生态大会上，腾讯云宣布大数据产品矩阵全面升级Data+AI能力体系，覆盖底层架构、数据平台、数据应用等全流程，帮助企业应对数据治理、多模态融合与智能化应用等挑战。 腾讯云副总裁黄世飞发表主题演讲 腾讯云副总裁黄世飞表示，腾讯云致力于融合Data+AI一体化能力，并引入AI Agent赋能，旨在解决传统数据平台在多模态处理和智能化上的不足，推动企业形成差异化AI竞争力，释放数据价值。   升级云原生数据基座，打造“开箱即用”的数据智能平台 近年来，随着算力成本的下降和开源大模型的普及，数据逐渐成为企业智能化发展的关键差异化因素。然而，传统数据平台在多模态数据处理、实时性、知识库构建等方面仍面临挑战。  对此，腾讯云提出构建“AI-Ready”数据智能平台，通过云原生架构、Data+AI一体化和Agent增强，为企业提供面向未来的数据底座。 在底层架构方面，腾讯云推出了DIaaS（数据智能即服务）理念，打造多模态智能数据湖TCLake，结合流湖引擎和企业级搜索ES，全面提升数据处理效率与智能化水平。 TCLake实现了结构化与非结构化数据的统一管理，并通过Lakehouse架构大幅提升计算性能，降低存储成本。 流湖引擎支持流批一体和秒级分析，将传统小时级的数据处理加速至秒级，运维成本降低近一半。 面向企业知识库构建，腾讯云增强了ES的云上能力，支持文本与向量的混合检索，并引入AutoRAG一键化生成方案，在10亿规模向量场景下实现毫秒级响应，查询性能提升10倍，存储节省高达90%。   WeData一体化平台升级，打通数据与AI全流程 在平台层，腾讯云WeData升级为端到端的一体化Data+AI平台，打通数据接入、治理、建模、训练到推理全链路，统一管理多模态数据、模型和指标资产，帮助企业实现从DataOps到AIOps的
excerpt_i18n.en:
On September 17, at the Tencent Global Digital Ecosystem Conference, Tencent Cloud announced a comprehensive upgrade of its big data product portfolio into a Data+AI capability system, covering the entire process from underlying architecture to data platforms and data applications, to help enterprises tackle challenges such as data governance, multimodal integration, and intelligent applications. 

Huang Shifei, Vice President of Tencent Cloud, delivered a keynote speech stating that Tencent Cloud is committed to integrating Data+AI capabilities and introducing AI Agent empowerment to address the shortcomings of traditional data platforms in multimodal processing and intelligence, helping enterprises build differentiated AI competitiveness and unlock data value.

The upgrade includes a cloud-native data foundation to create an out-of-the-box data intelligence platform. In recent years, as computing costs have decreased and open-source large models have become widespread, data has increasingly become a key differentiator for enterprise intelligence development. However, traditional data platforms still face challenges in multimodal data processing, real-time capabilities, and knowledge base construction.

In response, Tencent Cloud proposed building an AI-Ready data intelligence platform, providing enterprises with a future-proof data foundation through cloud-native architecture, Data+AI integration, and Agent enhancement. 

At the underlying architecture level, Tencent Cloud introduced the DIaaS (Data Intelligence as a Service) concept, creating the multimodal intelligent data lake TCLake, combined with the stream-lake engine and enterprise search ES, to comprehensively enhance data processing efficiency and intelligence. TCLake achieves the unification of structured and unstructured data.
excerpt_i18n.es: El 17 de septiembre, en la Conferencia Global de Ecosistema Digital de Tencent, Tencent Cloud anunció la actualización integral de su matriz de productos de big data hacia un sistema de capacidades Data+IA, cubriendo todo el proceso desde la arquitectura subyacente, plataformas de datos hasta aplicaciones de datos, para ayudar a las empresas a enfrentar desafíos como la gobernanza de datos, la fusión multimodal y las aplicaciones inteligentes. El vicepresidente de Tencent Cloud, Huang Shifei, declaró en su discurso temático que Tencent Cloud se dedica a integrar capacidades unificadas de Data+IA, incorporando agentes de IA para abordar las deficiencias de las plataformas de datos tradicionales en procesamiento multimodal e inteligencia, impulsando la formación de competitividad diferenciada en IA para las empresas y liberando el valor de los datos. Actualización de datos nativos de la nube.

title_i18n.es: Las tres principales actualizaciones de la computación inteligente de Tencent Cloud impulsan la transición de la infraestructura de IA de "soporte" a "motor".

excerpt_i18n.en:
On September 17, the Agent + Infra session of Tencent's Global Digital Ecosystem Summit focused on the theme "Intelligent Agents Driving Leapfrog Upgrades in Cloud Infrastructure," bringing together numerous industry leaders to explore technological breakthroughs and industrial practices of infrastructure in the AI era. Tencent Cloud's intelligent computing product leaders and industry clients provided in-depth interpretations of core topics such as AI-native cloud architecture, proactive service-oriented infrastructure, and full-chain security systems, while also announcing multiple significant achievements to strengthen the technical foundation for the large-scale deployment of intelligent agents.  

During the forum, Li Li, Vice President of Tencent Cloud, officially announced a major upgrade of Tencent Cloud Intelligent Computing toward "AI Infra Closer to Agents." Tencent Cloud has established a comprehensive solution integrating Agent Infra solutions, Cloud Mate cloud expert service agents, and full-chain security capabilities to help Agentic AI transition from the "lab" to "production-grade."  

Li Li stated that over the next two years, the number of enterprises deploying agents will double, and the growth rate of GenAI-related IaaS spending will reach 192%. With the explosive growth in the number of agents, enterprises' demand for cloud computing infrastructure will rapidly shift from "resource supply" to "business value." AI Infra must possess faster inference efficiency, more flexible tool integration, more reliable system guarantees, and more automated service capabilities. The core advantage of Tencent Cloud's intelligent computing system lies in its "same-source, same-structure" approach, eliminating the need to build AI-specific storage and other facilities by leveraging its well-honed cloud-native capabilities.
excerpt_i18n.es: El 17 de septiembre, la sesión especializada Agent + Infra de la Cumbre Global de Ecosistema Digital de Tencent se centró en el tema "Los agentes inteligentes impulsan el avance y la mejora de la infraestructura en la nube", reuniendo a numerosos líderes de la industria para explorar conjuntamente los avances tecnológicos y las prácticas industriales de la infraestructura en la era de la IA. Los responsables de los productos de computación inteligente de Tencent Cloud y los clientes del sector analizaron en profundidad temas clave como la arquitectura nativa de IA en la nube, la infraestructura de servicios proactivos y el sistema de seguridad de cadena completa, al mismo tiempo que presentaron múltiples logros importantes, sentando una base tecnológica sólida para la implementación a gran escala de agentes inteligentes. Durante el foro, Li Li, vicepresidente de Tencent Cloud, anunció oficialmente una importante actualización de la computación inteligente de Tencent Cloud hacia una "IA Infra más cercana a los Agent". Combined with the capabilities of Tencent Cloud's Intelligent Digital Human product, the platform has also introduced IP Agent to further activate knowledge assets and enhance user interaction experience. The 2025 Tencent Global Digital Ecosystem Summit was held on September 16-17. Tencent announced the full opening of its AI implementation capabilities and advantageous scenarios to accelerate the adoption of "user-friendly AI" across various industries. Dr. Wu Wenda, President of Tencent Health, Head of Tencent Life Sciences Laboratory, and Head of Tencent Health Equity Laboratory, announced three comprehensive acceleration plans covering large models, life sciences, and proactive user health management at the Smart Healthcare session. He also proposed seven key milestones for the future development of "AI + healthcare."

Dr. Wu believes artificial intelligence is fundamentally transforming how people manage and maintain their health. Tencent has been committed to driving healthcare innovation with AI technology, aiming to improve patient experience and enhance the efficiency and quality of clinical care. To date, AI-powered consultation guidance services, driven by large models, have been implemented in nearly 10,000 medical institutions across 34 provinces, municipalities, and autonomous regions. Tencent's medical imaging AI, Miying, is used in over 500 medical institutions nationwide, assisting healthcare professionals in conducting various medical examinations for nearly 10 million patients. Ready-to-use medical AI solutions serve more than 1,300 organizations, including hospitals, pharmaceutical and medical device companies, research institutions, and medtech firms.

Dr. Wu emphasized, "In the field of AI + healthcare, what we rely on are two things—endurance and determination, both of which are long-term endeavors." Artificial intelligence is fundamentally changing how people manage and maintain their health.

excerpt_i18n.en:
Amid the new normal of shifting from "incremental" to "stock-based" growth, companies are widely experiencing "growth anxiety." On September 17, at the 2025 Tencent Global Digital Ecosystem Conference, Tencent Qidian Marketing Cloud underwent a comprehensive upgrade, launching the full-link marketing intelligent agent "Magic Agent" as its core. This aims to provide businesses with a new growth solution through AI technology, addressing marketing growth challenges from high-level strategy to frontline execution.

Li Xuechao, Vice President of Tencent Cloud and Head of Tencent Qidian, stated that in the stock era, Tencent Qidian Marketing Cloud drives growth for businesses through three major upgrades. The intelligent enhancement of Marketing Cloud's core products simplifies operations and significantly boosts efficiency. The marketing decision engine, Customer AI, enables precision marketing through model-driven approaches, ensuring data-backed decisions. The full-link intelligent agent, Magic Agent, frees marketing personnel from tedious tasks, helping companies quickly build versatile AI marketing teams.

Marketing Cloud's core products have undergone a comprehensive AI upgrade to streamline business operations. In the past, marketing tools often featured complex interfaces, high specialization, and steep learning curves, making it difficult for business staff to fully utilize their functions. Addressing the "execution anxiety" faced by frontline personnel, this upgrade deeply integrates AI capabilities into foundational products such as Customer Data Platform (CDP), Marketing Automation (MA), Social Customer Relationship Management (SCRM), and Fusion Analysis (FA), transforming complex "technical operations" into simple "business dialogues."
excerpt_i18n.es: Ante la nueva normalidad de pasar del "incremento" al "stock", las empresas están cayendo comúnmente en la "ansiedad por el crecimiento". El 17 de septiembre, en la Conferencia Global de Ecosistema Digital de Tencent 2025, Tencent Qidian Marketing Cloud se actualizó por completo, lanzando un agente de marketing de cadena completa centrado en "Magic Agent", con el objetivo de proporcionar a las empresas un nuevo conjunto de soluciones de crecimiento mediante tecnología de IA, para resolver los dilemas de crecimiento en marketing desde la estrategia de alto nivel hasta la ejecución de primera línea. Li Xuechao, vicepresidente de Tencent Cloud y responsable de Tencent Qidian, declaró: En la era del stock, Tencent Qidian Marketing Cloud ayuda a las empresas a proporcionar crecimiento mediante tres actualizaciones. La inteligencia de los productos básicos de Marketing Cloud simplifica las operaciones y mejora significativamente la eficiencia.

title_i18n.en: Tencent Global Digital Ecosystem Conference 2025: Tencent Education Intelligent Agent Platform officially launched, AI + talent cultivation system upgraded.
title_i18n.es: 2025 Cumbre Global de Ecosistema Digital de Tencent: Se lanza oficialmente la plataforma de agentes inteligentes educativos de Tencent y se actualiza el sistema de formación de talentos con IA.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 9月16日，2025腾讯全球数字生态大会智慧教育专场上，腾讯教育聚焦AIGC与Agent方向的创新应用与探索成果，发布“腾讯教育智能体平台”，并展示了AI基础设施升级、AI Agent平台工具与教育场景化应用、AI+教育生态体系创新等重要进展。同时，面向高等教育领域，腾讯“AI百校行”正式启动；面向青少年人工智能教育的AIGC创作工坊也将加速落地至全国各地中小学校园。 腾讯云副总裁、腾讯教育负责人石梅表示，腾讯教育聚焦AI+教育，以“AI in All”为战略思路，围绕人工智能教育（AI Education）、智慧教育（AI for Education）、科研计算（AI for Science）三大方面持续耕耘，助力AI人才培养及科研创新。   腾讯云副总裁、腾讯教育负责人石梅     AI基础设施升级，支撑教育行业大模型应用创新 腾讯教育正以AI为核心驱动力，整合基础架构、工具与产品能力，从技术支撑、场景落地到生态共建等多维度发力，推动AI技术与教育深度融合。腾讯云副总裁、腾讯教育解决方案负责人杨晖指出，教育行业服务广泛C端用户，需要满足高并发、低延迟、高稳定运行需求，随着大模型能力升级与应用场景爆发，行业对AI基础设施的弹性扩容与性能优化需求普遍提升。   腾讯云副总裁、腾讯教育解决方案负责人杨晖   腾讯云依托在云计算、分布式存储、高性能网络领域的积累及多行业场景优化经验，推进AI基础设施升级，加速教育行业大模型应用，推动技术服务教学实践。例如，腾讯云智算团队发布的Agent Infra工程套件，将助力Agentic AI从实验室原型走向教育场景生产级落地，打通技术应用“最后一公里”。 核心技术支撑方面，腾讯云通过重点优化token训练加速、RDMA星脉网络、高性能文件存储、GPU调度等组件，助力教育企业实现降本增效。
excerpt_i18n.en:
On September 16, at the 2025 Tencent Global Digital Ecosystem Conference's Smart Education Session, Tencent Education focused on innovative applications and explorations in AIGC and Agent, launching the "Tencent Education Agent Platform" and showcasing key advancements in AI infrastructure upgrades, AI Agent platform tools and educational scenario applications, and AI+education ecosystem innovation. Simultaneously, for the higher education sector, Tencent's "AI 100 Universities Initiative" officially commenced; the AIGC Creation Workshop for youth AI education will also accelerate its rollout to primary and secondary schools nationwide. Shi Mei, Vice President of Tencent Cloud and Head of Tencent Education, stated that Tencent Education focuses on AI+education with the strategic approach of "AI in All," continuously working on three major areas: AI Education, AI for Education, and AI for Science, to support AI talent cultivation and scientific research innovation. 

AI infrastructure upgrades support innovation in large model applications for the education industry. Tencent Education is driving the deep integration of AI technology and education with AI as the core driver, integrating infrastructure, tools, and product capabilities across multiple dimensions from technical support and scenario implementation to ecosystem collaboration. Yang Hui, Vice President of Tencent Cloud and Head of Tencent Education Solutions, pointed out that the education industry serves a broad range of end-users and must meet demands for high concurrency and low latency.
excerpt_i18n.es: El 16 de septiembre de 2025, en la sesión especial de educación inteligente de la Cumbre Global de Ecosistema Digital de Tencent, Tencent Education se centró en las aplicaciones innovadoras y los resultados de exploración en AIGC y Agent, lanzó la Plataforma de Agentes Inteligentes Educativos de Tencent y mostró avances importantes como la actualización de la infraestructura de IA, las herramientas de la plataforma de Agent de IA y las aplicaciones educativas contextuales, y la innovación del ecosistema de IA+educación. Al mismo tiempo, para la educación superior, se lanzó oficialmente la iniciativa Cien Universidades de IA de Tencent; el taller de creación AIGC para la educación en inteligencia artificial de jóvenes también se acelerará para implementarse en escuelas primarias y secundarias de todo el país. Shi Mei, vicepresidente de Tencent Cloud y responsable de Tencent Education, declaró que Tencent Education se centra en IA+educación, utilizando A.

title_i18n.zh: LLM开源2.0大洗牌：60个出局，39个上桌，AI Coding疯魔，TensorFlow已死
title_i18n.en: Open Source LLM 2.0 Reshuffle: 60 Out, 39 In, AI Coding Frenzy, TensorFlow Is Dead.
title_i18n.es: Reorganización masiva de código abierto LLM 2.0: 60 eliminados, 39 incorporados, la codificación con IA enloquece, TensorFlow ha muerto.

title_i18n.zh: 腾讯云数智运营商行业解决方案图谱升级发布，聚焦智能化国际化助力产业跃迁
title_i18n.en: Tencent Cloud's Digital Intelligence Operator Industry Solution Blueprint has been upgraded and released, focusing on intelligent internationalization to facilitate industrial leapfrogging.
title_i18n.es: El mapa de soluciones de operadores digitales inteligentes de Tencent Cloud se actualiza y lanza, centrándose en la inteligencia artificial y la internacionalización para impulsar la transición industrial.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 9月16日，2025腾讯全球数字生态大会在深圳举办。本次数智运营商专场以“新质生产力的崛起：AI+时代的产业革新”为主题，汇聚行业领袖、技术专家及生态合作伙伴，共同探讨如何通过数智化技术助力运营商业务模式革新与生态协同发展。 腾讯云副总裁曹磊表示，“运营商作为整个数字化基建的主力军，尤其是在智算时代的主力军，腾讯作为科技平台公司，和运营商进行场景共创、能力互补和生态共赢，这一定是推动着产业加速发展的不二之选。” 聚焦“AI+”升级发布运营商行业解决方案图谱 当前，全球AI格局正在从技术研发的“单点突破期”迈入产业应用的“深度渗透期”，“人工智能+”正深入各行各业。运营商作为数字基建的核心参与者，迎来了业务增长的新空间，也面临技术与场景如何深度衔接、能力与价值如何高效协同等问题。 腾讯云运营商行业总经理张晋表示，AI正从“智能工具”演化成“共生伙伴”，并持续重塑产业格局。面对趋势，腾讯云将携手运营商和生态伙伴加速AI与数据融合、AI与场景融合、AI与流程融合，通过智能体平台、数据空间等构建差异化竞争力，推动产业升级和范式革新。 大会现场，腾讯云运营商行业解决方案总监秦若毅升级发布了《运营商行业解决方案图谱（2025）》，围绕云网融合、自主创新、人工智能、安全服务、数据服务、中资出海六大方向，分享腾讯云对运营商行业数智化发展趋势的观察，并贴合行业需求场景阐述解决方案，旨在助力运营商应对网络智能化升级、技术自主可控、人工智能创新、全球化拓展等机遇与挑战，同时为千行百业提供“连接+算力+能力”的一体化服务支撑。 联合信通院发布《智能体驱动的大模型系统工程与产业实践》 会上，腾讯云携手中国信息通信研究院云计算与大数据研究所，联合发布《智能体驱动的大模型系统工程与产业实践——电信运营商与云服务商的合作探索》白皮书。该报告系统梳理了全球AI大模型及智能体技术的最新发展趋势，首次提出以“智
excerpt_i18n.en:
On September 16, 2025, the Tencent Global Digital Ecosystem Conference was held in Shenzhen. The digital intelligence operator session, themed "The Rise of New Quality Productive Forces: Industrial Innovation in the AI+ Era," brought together industry leaders, technical experts, and ecosystem partners to explore how digital intelligence technologies can help operators innovate business models and achieve synergistic ecosystem development. 

Cao Lei, Vice President of Tencent Cloud, stated that operators, as the main force in digital infrastructure, especially in the intelligent computing era, and Tencent, as a technology platform company, can collaborate on scenarios, complement capabilities, and achieve mutual ecosystem benefits, making this partnership the optimal choice to accelerate industrial development.

Focusing on "AI+," an upgraded operator industry solution map was released. Currently, the global AI landscape is transitioning from a "single-point breakthrough period" in technology R&D to a "deep penetration period" in industrial applications, with "AI+" deeply integrating into various sectors. As core participants in digital infrastructure, operators are facing new growth opportunities but also challenges such as how to deeply connect technology with scenarios and efficiently synergize capabilities with value.

Zhang Jin, General Manager of Tencent Cloud's Operator Industry, noted that AI is evolving from an "intelligent tool" to a "symbiotic partner" and continues to reshape the industrial landscape. In response to this trend, Tencent Cloud will collaborate with operators and ecosystem partners to accelerate the integration of AI with data, scenarios, and processes, building differentiated competitiveness through intelligent agent platforms and data spaces to drive industrial upgrading and paradigm innovation.

At the conference, Qin Ruoyi, Director of Tencent Cloud's Operator Industry Solutions, unveiled the upgraded Operator Industry Solution Map.
excerpt_i18n.es: El 16 de septiembre de 2025, se celebró en Shenzhen la Conferencia Global de Ecosistema Digital de Tencent. La sesión especial para operadores digitales inteligentes, bajo el tema "El surgimiento de las nuevas fuerzas productivas: innovación industrial en la era de la IA+", reunió a líderes de la industria, expertos técnicos y socios del ecosistema para debatir cómo la tecnología digital inteligente puede impulsar la renovación de los modelos de negocio de los operadores y el desarrollo coordinado del ecosistema. Cao Lei, vicepresidente de Tencent Cloud, declaró que los operadores, como fuerza principal de la infraestructura digital, especialmente en la era de la computación inteligente, y Tencent, como empresa de plataforma tecnológica, colaboran en la creación de escenarios, complementación de capacidades y beneficio mutuo del ecosistema, lo que sin duda es la opción ideal para acelerar el desarrollo industrial. Se centró en la actualización "IA+" para operadores.

title_i18n.en: Tencent Announces Global Rollout of Scenario-Based, AI Capabilities to Accelerate Industrial Efficiency
title_i18n.zh: 腾讯宣布全球推出场景化AI能力，加速工业效率提升。
title_i18n.es: Tencent anuncia el despliegue global de capacidades de IA basadas en escenarios para acelerar la eficiencia industrial.

excerpt_i18n.en: Launch of AI Agent Development Platform 3.0, available internationally via Tencent Cloud, at the 2025 Global Digital Ecosystem Summit Tencent Cloud’s overseas client base doubled since last year; achieved high double-digit year-over-year growth over the past three years Dowson Tong, Senior Executive Vice President of Tencent and CEO of the Cloud and Smart Industries Group, delivering a keynote speech at the 2025 Global Digital Ecosystem Summit Shenzhen, 16 September 2025 - Tencent today announced the global roll-out of new scenario-based AI capabilities, empowering enterprises across diverse industries to accelerate industry efficiency and advance international growth. Announced at the 2025 Tencent Global Digital Ecosystem Summit, held at the Shenzhen World Exhibition & Convention Cent
excerpt_i18n.zh: 2025全球数字生态大会上，腾讯云推出AI智能体开发平台3.0，该平台通过腾讯云向全球开放。腾讯云海外客户数量较去年翻倍，实现高双位数增长。
excerpt_i18n.es: Lanzamiento de la Plataforma de Desarrollo de Agentes de IA 3.0, disponible internacionalmente a través de Tencent Cloud, en la Cumbre Global del Ecosistema Digital 2025. La base de clientes en el extranjero de Tencent Cloud se duplicó desde el año pasado; logró un crecimiento de doble dígito alto.

title_i18n.zh: 2025腾讯云国际出海峰会：国际业务高双位数增长，海外客户规模同比增长翻倍
title_i18n.en: Tencent Cloud International Expansion Summit 2025: International business achieves high double-digit growth, overseas customer base doubles year-on-year.
title_i18n.es: Cumbre Internacional de Tencent Cloud 2025: Crecimiento de doble dígito en negocios internacionales, clientes en el extranjero duplicados interanual.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 9月16日，2025腾讯全球数字生态大会国际出海峰会在深圳国际会展中心召开。来自全球多个国家和地区的企业代表、行业专家聚焦全球数字化进程，共同探讨国际市场机遇与数字化转型实践，分享一线实战经验，探讨把握智能技术机遇实现效率升级的新可能。 腾讯集团高级执行副总裁、云与智慧产业事业群CEO汤道生在致辞中提到，“向智能化要产业效率，向全球化要收入规模”，已经成为企业增长的两大核心动力。腾讯将打造“智能化”与“全球化”两大效率引擎，助力企业稳健和可持续增长。                                               腾讯云也在峰会期间公布了国际化业务的最新进展：产品全面拥抱国际化，完成多项产品和功能升级，全面适配全球技术生态。过去3年，腾讯云国际业务持续高双位数增长，90%以上的互联网企业、95%以上的头部游戏公司出海都选择了腾讯云。 全球产业力量齐聚，共议AI+云新机遇 在国际出海峰会上，GoTo 集团、TrueIDC、阿联酋电信集团、Converge ICT、Indosat Ooredoo Hutchison (IOH)等海外企业代表共同探讨了企业该如何用云服务和领先的 AI 技术推动下阶段增长等议题、分享了和腾讯云合作过程中的实践和感受。 面向国际市场，腾讯云以创新应用链接全球，打造了诸多“尖刀”产品，正不断将技术实力转化为客户价值。例如腾讯云智能体开发平台（ADP）面向全球发布3.0版，在3个月内完成了近600项需求的开发，持续迭代LLM+RAG、Workflow、Multi-Agent等多种智能体开发框架，帮助企
excerpt_i18n.en: On September 16, 2025, the Tencent Global Digital Ecosystem Conference International Expansion Summit was held at the Shenzhen World Exhibition & Convention Center. Enterprise representatives and industry experts from multiple countries and regions worldwide focused on the global digitalization process, jointly exploring international market opportunities and digital transformation practices, sharing frontline practical experience, and discussing new possibilities for leveraging intelligent technology to achieve efficiency upgrades. In his opening remarks, Dowson Tong, Senior Executive Vice President of Tencent and CEO of the Cloud and Smart Industries Group, stated that "seeking industrial efficiency through intelligentization and revenue scale through globalization" have become two core drivers of enterprise growth. Tencent will build two efficiency engines—"intelligentization" and "globalization"—to support enterprises in achieving stable and sustainable growth. During the summit, Tencent Cloud also announced the latest progress in its international business: its products have fully embraced internationalization, completed multiple product and feature upgrades, and are fully adapted to the global technology ecosystem. Over the past three years, Tencent Cloud's international business has maintained high double-digit growth, with over 90% of internet companies and over 95% of leading gaming companies choosing Tencent Cloud for their overseas expansion.
excerpt_i18n.es: El 16 de septiembre, se celebró en el Centro Internacional de Exposiciones de Shenzhen la Cumbre Internacional de Expansión Global de la Conferencia Mundial sobre Ecosistema Digital de Tencent 2025. Representantes empresariales y expertos de la industria de múltiples países y regiones se centraron en el proceso de digitalización global, debatieron conjuntamente las oportunidades del mercado internacional y las prácticas de transformación digital, compartieron experiencias prácticas de primera línea y exploraron nuevas posibilidades para aprovechar las oportunidades de la tecnología inteligente y lograr una mejora de la eficiencia. Tang Daosheng, Vicepresidente Ejecutivo Senior del Grupo Tencent y CEO de la Unidad de Negocio de Nube e Industria Inteligente, mencionó en su discurso que "buscar la eficiencia industrial en la inteligencia y la escala de ingresos en la globalización" se ha convertido en los dos motores centrales del crecimiento empresarial. Tencent construirá estos dos motores de eficiencia, "inteligencia" y "globalización", para ayudar a las empresas a crecer de manera sólida.

title_i18n.zh: 腾讯云以“云+AI”助力金融数智化升级   已打造100+AI应用场景最佳实践
title_i18n.en: Tencent Cloud drives financial digital and intelligent transformation with "Cloud + AI", having established over 100 best-practice AI application scenarios.

excerpt_i18n.zh: “人工智能已成为金融机构提升效率和生产力的「战略杠杆」，正加速重构金融场景并深度创造价值。” 9月16日，腾讯云高级副总裁徐翊鸣在2025腾讯全球数字生态大会·数智金融专场上表示，“目前，腾讯云已经围绕银行、保险、大资管、互金及金融行业通用场景，积累了100多个AI应用场景的最佳实践，支持金融机构创新和提效。” 随着AI大模型从技术探索全面进入产业落地阶段，“数据质量”成为了企业发展 AI的核心瓶颈。为了助力金融机构打造系统性数据工程能力，腾讯云发布了“TBDS多模态智能数据湖金融解决方案”。据腾讯云大数据TBDS中心总经理徐晓敏介绍，面向AI时代，多模态数据湖致力于帮助金融机构融合大数据和AI一体化存储和计算底座，快速实现AI-Ready，激发数据价值。   以云+AI，助力金融机构数智化升级 “当前，金融业面临行业发展转变、客户需求升级、风险管理复杂、运营效率待提升等挑战，数智化转型成为金融业应对挑战和长远发展的必然选择。”中国信通院云大所副所长兼金融科技研究部主任何阳在演讲中表示。 在AI大模型领域，腾讯一直践行“AI In ALL”的战略，将内部900多个应用接入了混元大模型，让广告、支付、社交等业务场景与AI深度融合，通过场景的打磨来迭代产品和模型。面向金融行业，腾讯云将领先的技术封装成行业方案，依托金融行业完善的数字化基础设施、结构化数据和丰富的应用场景，助力银行、保险、证券等金融业态加速重塑。 腾讯金融云副总经理曹骏表示，腾讯云打造的金融行业解决方案覆盖B端和C端，以“云+AI”助力金融机构数智化升级。在B端，腾讯云提供数据库TDSQL、大数据TBDS、专有云TCE腾讯云TI平台及智能体应用开发平台ADP，以及丰富的应用能力，支持金融机构AI创新。 目前，腾讯专有云TCE已为人民银行、建设银行、招商银行、中信建投等各类金融机构打造了上百朵自主创新的云
excerpt_i18n.en: Artificial intelligence has become a "strategic lever" for financial institutions to enhance efficiency and productivity, accelerating the reconstruction of financial scenarios and deeply creating value. On September 16, Xu Yiming, Senior Vice President of Tencent Cloud, stated at the 2025 Tencent Global Digital Ecosystem Conference · Digital Intelligence Finance Session, "Currently, Tencent Cloud has accumulated over 100 best practices for AI application scenarios across banking, insurance, asset management, internet finance, and general financial industry scenarios, supporting innovation and efficiency improvement in financial institutions." As large AI models transition fully from technological exploration to industrial implementation, "data quality" has become the core bottleneck for enterprises developing AI. To help financial institutions build systemic data engineering capabilities, Tencent Cloud launched the "TBDS Multi-Modal Intelligent Data Lake Financial Solution." According to Xu Xiaomin, General Manager of Tencent Cloud Big Data TBDS Center, the multi-modal data lake aims to help financial institutions integrate big data and AI for unified storage and computing infrastructure, quickly achieve AI readiness, and unleash data value in the AI era.   Using cloud + AI to assist financial institutions in digital and intelligent upgrading. "Currently, the financial industry faces challenges such as industry transformation, evolving customer demands, complex risk management, and the need to improve operational efficiency. Digital and intelligent transformation has become an inevitable choice for the financial industry to address these challenges and achieve long-term development," said He Yang, Deputy Director of the Cloud and Big Data Research Institute and Head of the Fintech Research Department at the China Academy of Information and Communications Technology, in his speech. In the field of large AI models, Tencent has been implementing the "AI In All" strategy, integrating over 900 internal applications with hybrid...
excerpt_i18n.es: La inteligencia artificial se ha convertido en una "palanca estratégica" para que las instituciones financieras mejoren la eficiencia y la productividad, acelerando la reestructuración de los escenarios financieros y creando valor en profundidad. El 16 de septiembre, Xu Yiming, vicepresidente senior de Tencent Cloud, declaró en la Conferencia Global de Ecosistema Digital de Tencent 2025 - Sesión Especial de Finanzas Inteligentes: "Actualmente, Tencent Cloud ha acumulado más de 100 mejores prácticas de aplicaciones de IA en escenarios relacionados con la banca, seguros, gestión de grandes activos, finanzas en línea y situaciones comunes de la industria financiera, apoyando la innovación y mejora de eficiencia de las instituciones financieras". A medida que los grandes modelos de IA pasan completamente de la exploración técnica a la fase de implementación industrial, la "calidad de los datos" se ha convertido en el cuello de botella central para el desarrollo de la IA en las empresas. Para ayudar a las instituciones financieras a construir capacidades de ingeniería de datos sistemáticas.

title_i18n.en: Detecting and reducing scheming in AI models
title_i18n.zh: 检测并减少人工智能模型中的阴谋行为
title_i18n.es: Detección y reducción de maquinaciones en modelos de IA

excerpt_i18n.en: On September 16, 2025, the Tencent Global Digital Ecosystem Conference was held at the Shenzhen World Exhibition & Convention Center. The Smart Media session, themed "AI + Media: From Efficiency Revolution to Value Reconstruction," focused on the application of cutting-edge technologies like large AI models in the media sector, exploring new forms and opportunities for the media industry in the intelligent era. Centering on key aspects of media communication such as content creation, distribution operations, and user insights, Tencent Cloud shared in-depth practices and latest achievements of AI applications in the media industry, aiming to build a more media-savvy industrial digital intelligence assistant and help media organizations develop intelligent, efficient, and sustainable future core competitiveness. Currently, AI is accelerating the media industry's transition to a new phase of "scenario-driven, intelligent collaboration." Tencent Cloud Vice President Yan Peng stated that the media industry is at the intersection of technological transformation and business evolution, with AI profoundly changing content production models, dissemination paths, and interactive experiences, moving from efficiency enhancement to service creation and from content output to value co-creation. Tencent Cloud has accumulated extensive experience in scenarios such as cultural tourism information, cultural heritage dissemination, and cultural big data. Fan Xiaoxuan, a senior engineer from the Technology Bureau of China Media Group, shared practices and trends of AI visual creation in media content production. He mentioned that AI is gradually participating in creative processes like shot scheduling, image generation, and animation rendering, improving the efficiency and diversity of content production. With the core goal of enhancing the quality and efficiency of content creation, Tencent Cloud assisted China Media Group in developing the "CCTV Ting Media Large Model," building a multimodal system covering text, images, video, and audio.
excerpt_i18n.es: El 16 de septiembre de 2025, la Cumbre Global de Ecosistema Digital de Tencent se celebró en el Centro de Exposiciones Internacional de Shenzhen. La sesión especial de Medios Inteligentes, con el tema "IA + Medios: de la revolución de eficiencia a la reestructuración de valor", se centró en la aplicación de tecnologías avanzadas como los grandes modelos de IA en el sector mediático, explorando nuevas formas y oportunidades para la industria en la era de la inteligencia artificial. En torno a eslabones clave de la comunicación mediática, como la creación de contenido, la distribución operativa y la comprensión del usuario, Tencent Cloud compartió prácticas profundas y los últimos avances en aplicaciones de IA para la industria, comprometido a crear un asistente de digitalización inteligente que comprenda mejor los medios, ayudando a las instituciones mediáticas a construir una futura competitividad central inteligente, eficiente y sostenible. Actualmente, la IA está acelerando la impulsión de la industria mediática hacia la "conducción por escenarios".

title_i18n.en: Tencent x Juewei Food: Achieved the first full-chain AI Agent marketing campaign, resulting in a 3.1-fold performance breakthrough compared to the manual group.
title_i18n.es: Tencent x Juewei Food: primera implementación de marketing integral con agente de IA, logrando un rendimiento 3.1 veces superior al del equipo manual.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 9月16日，2025腾讯全球数字生态大会在深圳举办。大会期间，绝味食品宣布携手腾讯智慧零售升级发布绝味AI会员智能体：基于腾讯企点营销云的Magic Agent产品，及其底层的腾讯云智能体开发平台、混元大模型+DeepSeek双模型能力，首次实现AI Agent参与全链路营销，AI组的销售业绩是人工组的3.1倍，内容点击率1.8倍，支付转化率2.4倍，企微好友删除率降低47%，推动营销从“千人一面”进入“万人万面”，迈入“AI 智能体时代”。 绝味集团首席数智增长官谌鹏飞分享“鹅厂鸭厂AI数智共创”新成果 当前，零售行业正面临增长触顶、流量成本上升、消费者行为分化升级等诸多挑战，企业从粗放的“规模扩张”转向“精细化运营”已成共识。8月，国务院印发《关于深入实施“人工智能+”行动的意见》，并推动“人工智能+”消费提质。AI正成为未来商业世界中的确定性变量，如何通过AI等数字化技术实现效率提升、业绩增长，正成为中国企业的“必答题”。 作为中国头部卤味品牌，绝味食品从2023年开启全渠道的AI数智化探索，并携手腾讯探索“AI+零售连锁”创新场景，其中“AI+营销”成为双方重点共创方向。长期以来，企业的营销面临着链路复杂、专业化决策多、匹配不精准等问题，陷入高投入难见水花、ROI低的困境，基于腾讯领先的技术能力和绝味深厚的行业经验，双方共同升级发布行业首个全链路AI营销智能体，以技术创新破解零售增长难题。 升级后的绝味AI会员智能体，首次实现了复杂营销链路的全智能化，企业营销和运营部门只需要“对话式”输入具体的营销活动要求，AI会员智能体便会智能完成从策略制定到执行落地的全过程，覆盖业务诊断、人群提取、权益/商品/内容匹配、触达策略设计、活动执行、效果复盘等营销环节，真正将企业的会员库从“消费数据”升级为可运营、可增值的“会员资产”，实现万人万面精准营销。 基于腾讯企点营销云CDP
excerpt_i18n.en:
On September 16, 2025, the Tencent Global Digital Ecosystem Conference was held in Shenzhen. During the event, Juewei Food announced a collaboration with Tencent Smart Retail to upgrade and launch the Juewei AI Member Agent. Leveraging Tencent’s Magic Agent product from Qidian Marketing Cloud, along with the underlying Tencent Cloud Intelligent Agent Development Platform and the dual-model capabilities of Hunyuan and DeepSeek, this marks the first implementation of an AI Agent participating in full-chain marketing. The AI group achieved sales performance 3.1 times that of the manual group, a content click-through rate 1.8 times higher, a payment conversion rate 2.4 times higher, and a 47% reduction in the deletion rate of enterprise WeChat contacts. This advancement shifts marketing from "one message for all" to "personalized engagement for each individual," ushering in the "AI Agent Era."  

Chen Pengfei, Chief Digital Intelligence Growth Officer of Juewei Group, shared new achievements from the "AI and Digital Intelligence Co-creation between Goose Factory and Duck Factory." Currently, the retail industry faces challenges such as growth plateauing, rising traffic costs, and evolving consumer behavior. There is a consensus that businesses must transition from extensive "scale expansion" to "refined operations." In August, the State Council issued the "Opinions on Deepening the 'AI+' Initiative" and promoted "AI+" for consumption upgrade. AI is becoming a definitive variable in the future commercial landscape, and leveraging AI and other digital technologies to enhance efficiency and drive growth has become a "mandatory question" for Chinese enterprises.  

As a leading Chinese braised food brand, Juewei Food began exploring full-channel AI digitalization in 2023 and partnered with Tencent to innovate "AI + retail chain" scenarios, with "AI + marketing" becoming a key co-creation focus.
excerpt_i18n.es: El 16 de septiembre de 2025, se celebró en Shenzhen la Cumbre Global de Ecosistema Digital de Tencent. Durante el evento, Juewei Food anunció en colaboración con Tencent Smart Retail la actualización del lanzamiento de su agente inteligente de membresía AI Juewei: basado en el producto Magic Agent de Tencent Qidian Marketing Cloud, junto con la plataforma de desarrollo de agentes inteligentes de Tencent Cloud y las capacidades de doble modelo Hunyuan + DeepSeek, se logró por primera vez que un agente de IA participara en el marketing de cadena completa. El grupo de IA alcanzó un rendimiento de ventas 3,1 veces mayor que el grupo manual, una tasa de clics en contenido 1,8 veces mayor, una tasa de conversión de pagos 2,4 veces mayor y una reducción del 47% en la tasa de eliminación de amigos de WeChat Work, impulsando la transición del marketing de "mil personas, una cara" a "diez mil personas, diez mil caras", entrando en la era del agente inteligente de IA.

excerpt_i18n.en:
On September 16, the 2025 Tencent Global Digital Ecosystem Conference's Smart Mobility Session, themed "AI-Driven Efficiency Across All Automotive Scenarios," was held in Shenzhen. Zhong Xiangping, Vice President of Tencent Group and President of Tencent Smart Mobility, stated that the global industry is entering a new phase of "efficiency competition." Driven by AI technology, the automotive industry is accelerating its transformation, with the competitive trend of "the fast eating the slow" becoming increasingly evident. After rapid development in electrification and intelligence, China's automotive industry has entered a market bottleneck period characterized by highly homogeneous competition. New vehicles feature increasingly higher configurations, faster iterations, and lower prices—offering users "more for the same price," but presenting companies with the challenge of "increased revenue without increased profits." In this context, the efficiency with which automakers embrace AI intelligence will determine their ultimate position in the market competition. How to seize the new technological wave, transition from "scale expansion" to "value deepening," and build resilience for long-term development is a critical question every company must answer. 

Zhong Xiangping, Vice President of Tencent Group and President of Tencent Smart Mobility, explained that as a digital assistant and ecosystem co-builder for the automotive industry, Tencent is committed to deepening its self-developed technologies, continuously strengthening the infrastructure of cloud, mapping, and AI. Through its "vehicle-cloud integration" strategy and integrated cloud-mapping service model, Tencent leverages its full-stack AI capabilities to help companies build intelligent infrastructure, creating value for users and enterprises with "usable AI."

excerpt_i18n.en:
Leifeng News, September 16, 2025, Beijing — METiS Pharmaceuticals, a leader in AI-driven nano-delivery innovation, today officially launched its self-developed NanoForge platform, the world's first AI-powered nano-delivery platform, at the Zhongguancun (Daxing) Cell and Gene Therapy Industrial Park. Dr. La Caida, co-founder and CEO of METiS, led the company's heads of AI, platform technology, and RNA R&D in presenting NanoForge's innovative breakthroughs and pipeline development applications. 

NanoForge is the world's first AI-driven nano-delivery platform. Based on quantum chemistry and molecular dynamics simulations, it integrates METiS's proprietary high-throughput wet lab and screening platform, a novel synthetic lipid language model and generative algorithm, an AI agent for nanomaterial screening and research, and the world's largest library of over 10 million LNP lipids. The platform enables a closed-loop process from molecular generation, property prediction, AI-guided dry and wet lab iterations, and lipid formulation design and optimization to final dosage form determination, while continuously expanding nano-delivery data through ongoing learning and evolution. 

Using NanoForge, METiS has developed three core solutions: AiLNP (AI nucleic acid delivery system design platform), AiRNA (AI mRNA sequence design platform), and AiTEM (AI small molecule formulation design platform). 

To date, METiS has amassed over 10 million lipid structures and 100,000 data points for model training.
excerpt_i18n.es: Leifeng News, 16 de septiembre de 2025, Pekín. La empresa líder en innovación de administración de nanopartículas con IA, Jeta Technology, lanzó hoy en el Parque Industrial de Terapia Celular y Génica de Zhongguancun (Daxing) su plataforma NanoForge, la primera plataforma de administración de nanopartículas impulsada por IA desarrollada de forma independiente a nivel mundial. El Dr. Lai Caida, cofundador y CEO de Jeta Technology, junto con los científicos responsables de inteligencia artificial, tecnología de plataforma e investigación y desarrollo de ARN de la empresa, compartieron los avances innovadores de NanoForge y las prácticas de aplicación en el desarrollo de líneas de investigación. NanoForge es la primera plataforma de administración de nanopartículas impulsada por inteligencia artificial del mundo. Basada en simulaciones de química cuántica y dinámica molecular, NanoForge combina tecnología patentada de alto rendimiento en laboratorio.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 在2025国家网络安全宣传周活动中，数据的保护与利用成为焦点议题。党的二十届三中全会明确提出“建设和运营国家数据基础设施，促进数据共享”的重要部署。作为新质生产力核心生产要素，数据“供得出、流得动、用得好、保安全”的实现路径，已成为数字中国建设的关键课题。安恒信息CTO刘博在2025国家网安周网络安全产业链协同论坛上分享了《大模型时代数据“保护与利用”的探索成果及安恒实践》，为数据要素赋能实体经济提供了有力参考。 数据“供得出”：以多元连接器搭建数据流通基础 要数据实现价值，首先需解决“供得出”的难题。安恒信息“数由器”是连接数据的载体，缺少 AI 智能体的连接器，便如传统汽车缺失智驾与智能座舱，难以适配新时代需求。据此，安恒信息打造了标准型、全能型、增强型等多种形态的 “数由器”，满足不同用户的差异化需求。同时，构建以“数据合规流通数字证书（数据交易发票）为抓手的数据全流程交易合规监管模式，助力建立“政府包容审慎监管、企业诚信自治自证”为原则的数据流通制度，为数据“供得出”筑牢安全底座。   数据 “流得动”：可信数据空间破解流通难题 数据“流得动”是释放要素价值的关键，而可信数据空间与隐私计算技术，成为解决数据“流得动”的核心支撑。《可信数据空间发展行动计划（2024-2028 年）》明确，可信数据空间是基于共识规则、联接多方主体的重要基础设施。安恒信息构建 AI 原生“可信数据空间”，通过数据资产探查、数据产品智能登记上架、风险识别与控制、安全审核等多种智能体实现全流程智能化。 在关键技术层面，安恒信息深耕隐私保护计算，形成分布式安全多方计算（MPC）、联邦学习（FL）、可信执行环境（TEE）三大核心能力，实现数据 “可训不可见”“可用不可见”。相关技术获得信通院首张大模型安全训练证书，并斩获“星河杯” 全国
excerpt_i18n.es: En la Semana Nacional de Concienciación sobre Ciberseguridad 2025, la protección y utilización de datos se convirtió en el tema central. El Tercer Pleno del XX Comité Central del Partido estableció claramente la importante disposición de construir y operar infraestructuras nacionales de datos para promover el intercambio de datos. Como elemento central de las nuevas fuerzas productivas, la realización de que los datos se puedan suministrar, fluir, utilizar bien y garantizar su seguridad se ha convertido en un tema clave para la construcción de una China digital. title_i18n.es: CCTV entrevista a Zhou Hongyi: "Disparar primero y apuntar después". En la era de los agentes inteligentes, quien no entienda la IA quedará obsoleto.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 当下，人工智能无疑是最热门领域之一。近日，央视《读书》栏目邀请到360集团创始人周鸿祎，围绕人工智能这一核心话题展开深入交流，从日常应用到行业变革，从个人成长到国际竞争，周鸿祎的分享为公众理解AI时代提供了清晰的认知框架。 1、从大模型到智能体：AI的进化与人类的新角色 “过去人们说‘内事不决问张昭，外事不决问周瑜’，现在内外事不决其实可以问一问大模型。”周鸿祎点出了大模型在工作和生活中的核心价值。但要让大模型发挥作用，关键在于精准表达：“到了AI时代，表达能力特别重要，你说得越细节，它给的建议越有效。” 而智能体的出现，让AI从“光说不做”的聊天助理升级为“能落地干活”的数字员工。“大模型是大脑，负责规划推理；智能体是手脚，负责调用工具。”周鸿祎解释，智能体能拆解复杂任务、还有思考和规划的能力，这正是人类解决问题的核心逻辑。 随着智能体普及，人类角色将转变为AI的管理者，人来设定目标、训练模型、评估效果，因此，人的领导力和判断力会成为核心竞争力。 这种转变也带来了人与人之间能力的分化：“无视AI、不懂AI、不会管理智能体的人，注定会被淘汰。”反之，善用AI、能管理100个智能体的人将成为“超级个体”。周鸿祎强调，AI不是威胁，而是个体之间能力的放大器，能让强者更强。   2、AI的进步速度，如同“寒武纪生物大爆炸” 谈及AI的发展速度，周鸿祎用“寒武纪生物大爆炸”形容：“如今在编程、推理、智能体、图文生成等领域，AI每天的进步成果，跟一年前比较，就已是天壤之别。这背后是算力、数据、技术不断进步和开源生态的支撑。 据了解，纳米AI近日在产品迭代上持续发力，继完成从“超级智能体”到“多智能体蜂群”的升级后，仅隔半月再度推出 “纳米P视频”智能体，依托多智能体蜂群的技术能力，构建起国内首个集 “AI 视频生成 - AI 剪辑”于一体的一站式AI影片生成平台，解决了AI
excerpt_i18n.en:
Artificial intelligence is undoubtedly one of the hottest fields today. Recently, CCTV's "Reading" program invited Zhou Hongyi, founder of 360 Group, for an in-depth discussion centered on AI. Covering topics from daily applications to industry transformation, and from personal growth to international competition, Zhou's insights provided the public with a clear framework for understanding the AI era. 

1. From large models to intelligent agents: The evolution of AI and humanity's new role  
Zhou Hongyi noted, "In the past, people said 'for internal matters, consult Zhang Zhao; for external matters, consult Zhou Yu.' Now, for both internal and external matters, one can actually consult large models." He highlighted the core value of large models in work and life. However, the key to making large models effective lies in precise expression: "In the AI era, expressive ability is particularly important. The more detailed your description, the more useful its suggestions will be."  

The emergence of intelligent agents has upgraded AI from a "talk-only" chat assistant to a "task-executing" digital employee. "Large models are the brain, responsible for planning and reasoning; intelligent agents are the hands and feet, responsible for calling tools," Zhou explained. Intelligent agents can break down complex tasks and possess thinking and planning abilities—the core logic of human problem-solving.  

As intelligent agents become widespread, the human role will shift to that of an AI manager: setting goals, training models, and evaluating outcomes. Therefore, human leadership and judgment will become core competencies.  

This shift also brings a divergence in human capabilities: "Those who ignore AI, do not understand AI, or cannot manage intelligent agents are bound to be left behind." Conversely, those who skillfully use AI and can manage 100 intelligent agents will—
excerpt_i18n.es: Actualmente, la inteligencia artificial es sin duda uno de los campos más candentes. Recientemente, el programa de CCTV "Lectura" invitó a Zhou Hongyi, fundador del grupo 360, para un intercambio en profundidad sobre este tema central. Desde aplicaciones cotidianas hasta transformaciones industriales, y desde el crecimiento personal hasta la competencia internacional, las reflexiones de Zhou Hongyi ofrecen un marco claro para comprender la era de la IA. 1. De los grandes modelos a los agentes inteligentes: la evolución de la IA y el nuevo papel de la humanidad. "Antes se decía 'para asuntos internos consulta a Zhang Zhao, para asuntos externos consulta a Zhou Yu', pero ahora tanto los internos como los externos pueden consultarse a los grandes modelos". Zhou Hongyi destacó el valor central de los grandes modelos en el trabajo y la vida. Sin embargo, la clave para que los grandes modelos sean útiles reside en expresarse con precisión.

title_i18n.en: Lingyang launches enterprise-level marketing Agent, solving the "impossible trinity" for CMOs.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 消费者的注意力分散、人群需求不断细分、投放渠道的割裂，让预算、频次和效果成为营销行业的不可能三角。9月15日，阿里巴巴全资子公司瓴羊正式推出企业级营销Agent，直击营销人长期面临的五大痛点——热点追不上、素材创作慢、战役组织慢、投放拍脑袋、效果难计算，让营销更快、更准、更动人。 瓴羊营销Agent由灵感创意、营销策划、素材创作、媒介投放与结案分析等五大子Agent组成，运行在瓴羊Quick Audience、天攻智投等营销产品上，助力品牌实现“从灵感到落地”的全营销链路智能化，帮助企业建立起一个“AI+人”的超级市场部。   五大子Agent，成企业超级营销天团 企业可根据自身需求，无需搭建工作流，就可以自由组合五个子Agent协作，打造“超级营销天团”，达成营销目标 首先，灵感创意Agent内置“营销日历”，以可视化日历卡片形式整合全网活动热点、大促节点与竞品动态，提前预警高潜力营销机会。它还能根据企业所属行业自动生成定制化创意点子，用户一键确认后，即可联动后续Agent自动推进执行，真正实现“发现即行动”。 营销策划Agent则像是一群赛博策略军师团，快速理解营销活动诉求，自动拆解步骤，依次输出活动主题、人群、机制等完整策划，让营销方案从构思到成型一气呵成，兼具创意与落地性。 有了方案，落地是关键。素材创作Agent只需上传一张产品图，就能在短时间内生成50至100条个性化文案和数十张风格多样的海报，覆盖电商、短信、社交媒体等多种场景，甚至支持动图生成，极大提升内容生产效率。 在投放端，媒介投放Agent让营销人告别“凭感觉投放”。以户外广告为例，它能在1分钟内从全国超360个城市、数千万广告位中，精准筛选出目标人群集中、消费力强的高价值点位，并推荐“人群覆盖浓度≥30%”的优质资源。以会员运营为例，结合瓴羊超信等工具，Agent还可自动生成营销任务画布、批
excerpt_i18n.en:
Consumer distraction, increasingly segmented audience demands, and fragmented advertising channels have made budget, frequency, and effectiveness an impossible triangle in the marketing industry. On September 15, Lingyang, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Alibaba, officially launched an enterprise-level marketing Agent, directly addressing five long-standing pain points for marketers: inability to keep up with trends, slow content creation, slow campaign organization, arbitrary ad placement decisions, and difficulty measuring results—making marketing faster, more precise, and more compelling. The Lingyang Marketing Agent consists of five sub-Agents: Inspiration & Creativity, Marketing Planning, Content Creation, Media Placement, and Campaign Analysis & Reporting. It operates on Lingyang's marketing products such as Quick Audience and Tiangang Smart Investment, helping brands achieve end-to-end intelligent marketing "from inspiration to execution" and assisting companies in building a super marketing department powered by "AI + human expertise."

The five sub-Agents form a super marketing team for enterprises. Companies can freely combine these five sub-Agents to collaborate based on their needs without building workflows, creating a "super marketing team" to achieve marketing goals.

First, the Inspiration & Creativity Agent features a "marketing calendar" that integrates online event trends, promotional nodes, and competitor activities in a visual calendar card format, providing early warnings for high-potential marketing opportunities. It also generates customized creative ideas based on the company's industry. With a single click for confirmation, it automatically triggers subsequent Agents to execute, truly enabling "discover and act immediately."

The Marketing Planning Agent functions like a team of cyber strategists, quickly understanding marketing campaign objectives.
excerpt_i18n.es: La dispersión de la atención del consumidor, la creciente segmentación de la demanda y la fragmentación de los canales de difusión han convertido el presupuesto, la frecuencia y la efectividad en el triángulo imposible de la industria del marketing. El 15 de septiembre, Lingyang, filial de Alibaba, lanzó oficialmente su Agente de Marketing empresarial, abordando cinco dolores crónicos del sector: incapacidad de seguir tendencias, lentitud en la creación de materiales, organización lenta de campañas, decisiones de difusión intuitivas y dificultad para medir resultados, haciendo el marketing más rápido, preciso y conmovedor. El Agente de Marketing de Lingyang consta de cinco subagentes: inspiración creativa, planificación de marketing, creación de materiales, difusión mediática y análisis de cierre, operando en productos como Quick Audience y Tiangong Zhitou para potenciar

Hi, I have been building small AI Agents for quite some time now using various frameworks and one thing that always bugged me was that iterating on small things like prompts, flows, tools etc always took a code change + deployment of the app. While the prompt part can be solved with Langfuse I haven't found a good way to keep the flow management remote (and open source). Lately I have been working with Genkit ( https://github.com/firebase/genkit ) and love how modular it is. So I thought why not build a UI builder on top of that that can handle simple flows, prompts and basic tracing. And here we are with a first early version: https://flowshapr.ai Repo: https://github.com/flowshapr/flowshapr This first release can - Manage and execute simple flows remotely
